item.description:
The Newport Friend's Meetup Group set up with Gas Lamp Grille one of the funniest Trivia's in town. Great groups to compete against and we don't want to boast, but we will, we have won many times.

We are recruiting fun members that want to help keep our winning streak going...There are prizes involved. We realize Monday Football may keep some away soon, but Gas Lamp has several large-screen plasma televisions ...

Here's a question for you: What's the most fun way to spend a Monday night?

If you answered "trivia", you might just have what we're looking for. If you answered "hanging out with the most awesome group EVER", you can join us too. If you answered "playing with a rubber duckie", you may want to seek professional help (but come play trivia with us first).

The game consists of answering AS A TEAM forty questions, spread out over four categories.

Even if you don't think you'll know many of the answers, you can still hang out with us and get to know some friendly people.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be near the bar. Ask for Newport Friends Meetup : ) hosts - phone #'s given when you RSVP.
item.name: Trivia at Gas Lamp! Fun Group! Great time!
